text: hageye niviga – ‘‘ondu vele namage granthavannu ilisikottiddare navu avariginta heccu sanmargadalliruttiddevu’’-endu heluvantilla. Idiga nim'ma odeyana kadeyinda, vyaktavada purave, margadarsana hagu anugrahavu nim'ma balige bandide. Allahana vacanagalannu sullendu tiraskarisuva mattu adarinda (janarannu) tadeyuvataniginta dodda akrami yariddane? I riti nam'ma vacanagalinda (janarannu) tadedavarige navu, avaru tadedudara phalavagi kathina sikseyannu nidaliddeve
